fields.name: Privilege Of Cuteness (Passive):
fields.value: Because you're such a cute cat, you receive the next Evening's prompt at the start of every Day Phase. You may impose an additional technical that all players must follow. This must be approved by the host.

fields.name: Friendly Purr:
fields.value: Choose a Cat and a non-Cat player during each Day phase. Because of your super cute and friendly purring, you bond them together! The lower scoring of the two bonded players in the next Evening phase will be boosted to one spot below the higher player.

fields.name: Meow Your Heart Out (1x, Locked):
fields.value: Unlocks when your win condition is reached. An orchestra of meowing invigorates your fellow cats, granting them the ability to multi-task during the Night phase in which this ability is used.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Successfully boost two Cat members into the green zone on the Evening leaderboard.
